ygData.subject: Re: War
ygData.msgSnippet: ... really ... OOC: Ha! I thought grenades would be more powerful than missiles, you know, and it s my base, shouldn t I decide what does most damage? Oh, and

> (I see...so two 'grenades' hurt the shields, but five missiles didn't
really
> do that much?  Ok...anyway, about the Oblitercons, they are a very close
> team.  They take an attack on one of their team members as on attack on
> themselves)

OOC: Ha! I thought grenades would be more powerful than missiles, you know,
and it's my base, shouldn't I decide what does most damage? Oh, and the name
is not THECODE! I didn't get to pick my own e-mail, you know!

> Dark One activated his comm. unit.  "Oblitercons, I'm running low on
> missiles.  Try to not use energy weapons.  I wish to attempt to form
> Oblitertron again later."  Dark One fired of a pair of missiles as he
> received acknowledgements from the rest of his team.

Base damage: Base takes more damage than usual, the missiles were well
placed.

> Breakdown let out a loud grunt as the missile exploded against his left
> pectoral, the explosion tearing apart much of his armor, his face cut from
> the exploding metal.  "Hey, you too!" he  yelled as he fired a grenade off
at
> Shokaract.

Shokaract kicked the grenade, it flew towards Pyro.

Shokaract: think twice before throwing one of those stupid things.

> Pyro fired off three fire balls at Serge.

Serge's back is set on fire, the fire does a decent amount of damage before
Serge managed to put it out. Serge looks at Pyro then. He fires 4 times at
him.

> Hiss fired off three fusion blasts from his cannon at Shokaract.

Shokaract yells "Ow!" When the fusion blasts strike him, but he doesn't fire
back, he ignores Hiss entirely.

> Scavenger fired off another 25 explosive rounds at the Mafia Base.  He
lifted
> up his left arm, firing off another rocket from his bazooka at the Mafia
Base.

Base damage: Explosive rounds leave a dent in the base, they happened to
pierce the shields. The rocket strike the base, but the shields keep it from
doing much damage.

> Demon Wulf lifted his sword, another blade missile launching out at the
> shields.

Shields: Get hit, but that's about it. (Err, is this going to go on forever?
Just asking.)

> Flesh Ripper fired another blast of flames from his mouth at the base.

Base damage: Base fires at Flesh Ripper when the falmes hit the base, fire
doesn't do much damage to the base or it's shields.

> Dark Claw brought his hands together, slowly pulling them apart until they
> were three feet apart.  He threw the blue sizzling orb at the Mafia Base
> (same strength as two of the smaller orbs)

(I'd say this would do good damage, my perogative) Orb strike base, base's
shields take damage because it happened to penetrate the shields, because
the shields were indeed weakened at some points.

> Unitron dived, firing two more missiles at the Mafia Base, pulling up
> quickly, a few autogun blasts scraping against the underbelly of his jet
> fighter mode.

(Missiles...) Missiles strike base, do damage to shields.
